trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Zi Liang is a devout worshiper of Chauntea, the Earth Mother. She has considerably less faith in Goldenfields' defenders, so she patrols the temple-farm during her off-duty hours.
Ideal: "If we faithfully tend to our gardens and our fields, Chauntea will smile upon us."
Bond: "Goldenfields is the breadbasket of the North. People depend on its safety and prosperity, and I'll do what must be done to protect it."
Flaw: "I don't trust authority. I do what my heart says is right."

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. Zi carries twenty sling stones.
